Control Name: 3.11.4 You use profiling tools to profile your application code.
Control Statement: Application profiling will involve tooling like Visual Studio Performance Profile, AQTime, dotTrace, and others. These tools will give you in-depth analysis of individual code paths.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.11 What common problems do you have steps to troubleshoot in your operations playbook?
